column3: â€œMade me really horny best sex I ever had was with purple dreamâ€

â€œPurple Dream 
Looks: Quick review here.Been getting alot of purps recently. These were round popcorn buds with a deep purple colrating and cheesey yellow hairs. reminded me of a purple-indica dominant blu dream.
Smell/Taste: A pungent sour grape aroma dominates leaving little hint of blue"
column4: but the taste is led by a musty creamy earthy "blue"/grape flavor on exhale.Very nice
column5: usually dont such a differnce from smell...â€"

column3: â€œThis bud is an amalgamation of two sure fire strains. Purple dream allows you to feel calm, cool and collected. I would recommend this strain for anyone who wants to have a sense of control yet experience relaxed body sensations. Please don't pass this one by. Best by vapor.â€

â€œAn amazing strain.  Relaxing, calming...puts you in a great upbeat mood.  It would be difficult for almost anything to annoy you. Especially nice after work.  Its like a little vacation every time.  It doesn't come around much in this town, but when it does, I never fail to procure purple dream.  It is one of the first indica dominant strains I've tried and one of the best.  Its not a complete knockout which is nice ...â€

â€œI love this strain for it's very potent, eye heavy relaxing effect that allows me to still get things done for a bit then help me eat and sleep like a baby. Great for chillin with you better half. Sexy strain.â€

â€œAll I can say is that this is awesome. Love Love Love. Quick satifying, yet not too harsh of a high. perfect for on the go. I do suffer from anxiety alot and this seems to help super well. I do get pretty red eyes, but nothing an eyedrop solution could help. Just love it. If you've never tried it I HIGHLY recommend.â€

â€œIf you can avoid the couch-lock of this strain, just follow the second star to the right and head straight on til morning. I mean, damn! By the time you are taking your second hit, you are feeling the first. It has a sweet, berry flavored inhale, and a slightly musty exhale. I certainly got the munchies with PD. Skittles really hit the spot. As for the high, well, it is amazing. Every bowl I have reduced to ash and r...â€

â€œOh My Fucking God. This is an awesome strain. I love the Super Sticky Dark Green and Dark Purple Delicious Smelling Buds. I could've stopped there, but me and the person I was with found it necessary to have a Quarter Ounce in one sitting. After that I was absolutely Lost, im talking...â€
â€œ10/10, Dank with Jack in The Box breakfast. Straight Cloud9.â€

â€œI was told that the purple dream was a mix blue dream and granddaddy purple; two of my favorite strains. I had to try it based on that, and I am impressed. Apparently (according to the description here) it is part purple kush rather than GDP, but it doesn't matter. I really like this strain. It is mellow/calming, but doesn't stop me from functioning...pretty much exactly what I was hoping for. One of my new favorites...â€
â€œLives up to the name.â€

â€œMy all-time favorite.

It is as if Blue Dream and the sweetest purps in the valley got together for dinner one night, and made some poor decisions that led to the rapid maturity that comes with adolescent parenthood. They then took that little bundle of joy and taught it everything they knew about unconditional love and caring for their fellow citizens. 

This is Purple Dream; see her, favor her, get to know her.â€

â€œIt took a good 20 or 30 minutes to fully kick in. I thought I was handling it well until it came on full steam out of nowhere. It is a cerebral and thoughtful high that also puts you on the couch. I just want to lay down and think about things. Purple dream is a very fitting name.â€

â€œFirst and most distinct is visual improvement. Everythingâ€™s richer, colorful, but through rather narrow focus. â€œone of my favorite strains nice sweet tate and smell very stoney couch locking high (head & body high).â€

â€œOne of top favsâ€
â€œI had this strain in Michigan when I first started smoking and is a good basis for anyone new to the scene. Pick up a little and try it out! It's a solid but relaxing head and body high.â€

â€œPurple Dream's effects are relaxing, uplifting and pain relieving. There is definitely a cerebral stone with this strain so daytime use may not be the best time to partake of Purple Dream . I like it but I much prefer Blue Dream's effects. Overall a pleasant strain but there is some burn out when using. Would recommend for moderate pain relief and as a stress buster.â€
â€œFruity taste and smell. Every hit was critical. heavy body effect slight head buzz. Great combination. Glad i went with their recommendation. Thanks SWC TEMPE!â€
â€œConcentrate (BHO) tasted great and is a really nice chill relaxed and calm happy high. I'm enjoying at the moment.â€

â€œI just happens to pick up a great deal on this beautiful little flower. By nature I gravitate to strong heavy Indica s. Lately I have been trying to work some hybrid or straight sativas into my mix. This blows blue dream away in my opinion. The very slight kick you get from the GDP takes any of the more annoying sativa traits and blends in to a perfect anytime smoke, fully function, yet relived. There are zero negati...â€
â€œGreat stress reliever. I find it to be a very well balanced hybrid!â€
â€œvery funky great highâ€

â€œSmells like grape heaven, tasted amazing as well, got a head high first then body high kicked in. Functioning and performing tasks where quite easy to accomplish, while the heavy body and head high continued. Over all I would chose this for and any time high.â€

â€œNice strain. Although it's a indica-hydrid, its not a super heady high and leave you feeling groggy. Lasts about an hour tops. I liked that I could function on it, but still be productive. The taste was very berry, and the nuggets about the size of a large piece of popcorn. Beautiful color, with orange hairs, and lots of black and purplish leaves.â€

â€œSmooth on the throat, fruity berri-grape taste, feels like ur cortisol levels are decreasing. Great feeling when on and frustration level down. 

New favoriteâ€

column6: and aware.  Had it in the evening time

column3: â€œI enjoyed this strain a lot. The flavor is great. I'm currently working on adjusting my eating habits and have to say this one doesn't make me have the munchies as much as others but still gives me a great high.â€
â€œThis strain was very smooth when toking the bud, it's a very nice and light smoke but still gets you pretty baked. This is the type of kush that if you see it, you must getâ€
â€œmy favorite strain. a very relaxing high, without knocking you out. very chill and mellow.â€
â€œsmoked a bowl with one other person. still pretty baked but think its just wearing off. Great strain might not be good for morning use though.â€
â€œI'm not really a fan on this strain. It was very potent. It's not a functioning high.â€
â€œNot a huge fan of this strain. Just didn't do a ton for me.â€
â€œLove it. Nice head high with a side of sleepiness.â€
â€œRelaxed, Calm, Happy!â€
â€œLovely smooth draw to this one. Makes for a very mellow high. make yourself a quesadilla and prepare to be couch locked.â€
â€œGreat bud, has an awesome smell. Kind of dull looking, but gets you pretty good high for about an hour to an hour and a half. This indica is welcome in my bowl any day.â€
â€œGot this strain from Miranda Meds in Pacific, Washington. It's a good smoke and ill be first to say I love it.â€

â€œIf you like purple and blue dream you will like this one. I'm not a huge purple fan so I prefer a regular blue dream but it is pretty good. Swimming in the head pretty even in the body.â€

A bit sleepier than Blue Dream as well. Still a very nice high. The smoke was smooth and cough-less. The taste is VERY good. Kind of a woodsey finish. Dig it.â€

â€œKeep in mind im not a frequent smoker & I have a weaker constitution. I took 4 tokes mind you....got violently sick & dizzy...threw up and laid on my bed deep breathing to stop the spinning. My whole body was in a full blown flutter tingle....I thought I was dying until I passed outâ€
